case_circumstances:
This is a Georgia Bureau of Investigation/Ware County Sheriff's Office case, assisted by the NCMEC.  

Tips/leads can be forwarded to NCMEC, Special Agent Dale WILEY of the GBI (912-389-4103), or Lt. Jody Ponsell of the Ware County SO (912-287-2479).  

On December 18, 1988, the remains of an unidentified child were found in a wooded area in Waycross, Ware County, GA.  The child was approximately 2'09" tall and weighed between 20 and 25 pounds.  A composite sketch and clay reconstruction are available (see "Photos").
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Child was wearing a white knit pullover shirt with a red pony on the front, white thermal pajama bottoms, and a diaper.
dental: Dental information / charting is currently not available
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
